title: Common Network Problems
content:
Connectivity Issues:

Physical Layer Problems:
• Cable damage or disconnection
• Port failures
• Power issues
• Environmental interference
• Symptoms: No link lights, intermittent connectivity
• Tools: Cable testers, link lights, loopback tests

Configuration Problems:
• Incorrect IP addressing
• Subnet mask mismatches
• Default gateway issues
• VLAN misconfigurations
• Symptoms: Can't reach certain networks
• Tools: ipconfig, route tables, VLAN verification

Performance Issues:

Bandwidth Limitations:
• Insufficient capacity for traffic load
• Quality of Service (QoS) issues
• Bandwidth competing applications
• Symptoms: Slow file transfers, video stuttering
• Tools: Bandwidth monitors, traffic analyzers

Latency Problems:
• Network congestion
• Routing inefficiencies
• Processing delays
• Symptoms: High ping times, application timeouts
• Tools: ping, traceroute, latency monitors

DNS Issues:
• DNS server failures
• Incorrect DNS records
• DNS cache problems
• Symptoms: Can't resolve domain names
• Tools: nslookup, dig, DNS troubleshooting
